title: [Pictures of France: Savoi]
brief_description: Celebrated glaciers, lakes, forests and mountains including Mont Blanc provide scenic grandeur in the province of Savoi. Steamers take visitors to the spa, on Lake Geneva to drink the water and enjoy the varied sports. Wonderful views and winter sports are enjoyed by mountain-climbers and visitors, especially on the teleferry and ski-tows.
